{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Puckish Lycconen |image = XC3 Puckish Lycconen.png |caption = Puckish Lycconen |type = [[Keves Forces]]
|tab1 = 1st |category = [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] |level = 68 |area = [[Keves Castle]] ([[Troop Reserve Section]]) |spawntime = During ''[[Fate]]'' |respawn = No |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = |gold = |hp = |strength = |ether = |dexterity = |agility = |physdef = |ethdef = |critrate = |guardrate =
|tab2 = 2nd |category2 = [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] |level2 = 69 |area2 = [[Keves Castle]] ([[Annihilator Foundations]]) |spawntime2 = During ''[[Fate]]'' |respawn2 = No |movement2 = |detection2 = |exp2 = |cp2 = |sp2 = |gold2 = |hp2 = |strength2 = |ether2 = |dexterity2 = |agility2 = |physdef2 = |ethdef2 = |critrate2 = |guardrate2 = }} '''Puckish Lycconen''' is a [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] who is part of the [[Keves Forces]] and is fought at level 68 and 69 in [[Keves Castle]] during ''[[Fate]]''.
== Story == He is one of the Four Divine Wings staging an armed uprising within the castle, alongside [[Incorruptible Sitre]], [[Mediator Adrinael]], and [[Overfist Balroy]]. He has a specialty for luring opponents into traps, and was described by [[Lanz]] as similar to [[Taion]]. {{clr}}
